## Installation



You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/danilosarti/InnoVar) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("danilosarti/InnoVaR")
```

You can then load the package with:
```r
library(InnoVaR)
```
